titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain G French, Commanding HM Brig Sophie

mods.abstract: The letter informs French of the arrangements made for cruisers to patrol the 'Pirate coast' [Arab littoral of the Persian Gulf]. MacLeod also informs French of his intention to return to Bassadoor [BasidÅ«] to accompany Captain Frederick Faithfull, the Senior Officer of the Honourable Company's Marine, to 'Pirate coast' where the cruizers will be stationed.
